list.name: Episodes
list.rawQuery: SELECT StartTimestamp as time, CONCAT('Episode: ', PrimaryDetector, ' (', CAST(DurationHours as VARCHAR), 'h)') as text, 'Episode' as tags FROM ACM_CulpritHistory WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND StartTimestamp >= $__timeFrom() AND StartTimestamp <= $__timeTo()

targets.rawSql: SELECT TOP 1 HealthIndex FROM ACM_HealthTimeline WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY Timestamp DESC
SELECT TOP 1 CASE WHEN HealthIndex >= 85 THEN 'HEALTHY' WHEN HealthIndex >= 70 THEN 'CAUTION' ELSE 'ALERT' END as Status FROM ACM_HealthTimeline WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY Timestamp DESC

DECLARE @CurrentHealth FLOAT; SELECT TOP 1 @CurrentHealth = HealthIndex FROM ACM_HealthTimeline WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY Timestamp DESC; IF @CurrentHealth >= 90.0 SELECT 168.0 AS RUL_Hours ELSE SELECT TOP 1 RUL_Hours FROM ACM_RUL_Summary WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_RUL_Summary WHERE EquipID = $equipment) ORDER BY LastUpdate DESC

SELECT TOP 1 CONCAT(SensorName, ' (z=', CAST(ROUND(LatestAbsZ, 2) as VARCHAR), ')') as WorstSensor FROM ACM_SensorHotspots WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_SensorHotspots WHERE EquipID = $equipment) ORDER BY LatestAbsZ DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) as ActiveEpisodes FROM ACM_CulpritHistory WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(StartTimestamp)
SELECT TOP 1 CONCAT('Regime ', CAST(RegimeLabel as VARCHAR)) as CurrentRegime FROM ACM_RegimeTimeline WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) ORDER BY Timestamp DESC
SELECT Timestamp AS time, HealthIndex, FusedZ FROM ACM_HealthTimeline WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) ORDER BY Timestamp
SELECT Timestamp AS time, SensorName AS metric, NormValue AS value FROM ACM_SensorNormalized_TS WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) ORDER BY Timestamp, SensorName

SELECT TOP 20 SensorName AS [Sensor Name], ROUND(LatestAbsZ, 2) AS [Current Z-Score], ROUND(MaxAbsZ, 2) AS [Peak Z-Score], MaxTimestamp AS [Peak Time], ROUND(LatestValue, 2) AS [Current Value], ROUND(TrainMean, 2) AS [Normal Mean], AboveAlertCount AS [Alert Count], CASE WHEN LatestAbsZ >= 3 THEN 'ALERT' WHEN LatestAbsZ >= 2 THEN 'CAUTION' ELSE 'NORMAL' END AS [Level] FROM ACM_SensorHotspots WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(MaxTimestamp) AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_SensorHotspots WHERE EquipID = $equipment) ORDER BY LatestAbsZ DESC
SELECT Timestamp AS time, CONCAT('Regime ', CAST(RegimeLabel AS VARCHAR(10))) AS value FROM ACM_RegimeTimeline WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) ORDER BY Timestamp

SELECT CONCAT('Regime ', CAST(RegimeLabel as VARCHAR)) as regime, Percentage as value FROM ACM_RegimeOccupancy WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_RegimeOccupancy WHERE EquipID = $equipment) ORDER BY Percentage DESC
SELECT MetricName as metric, ROUND(MetricValue, 2) as value FROM ACM_RegimeStability WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_RegimeStability WHERE EquipID = $equipment)

SELECT RegimeLabel AS RegimeName, RecordCount AS TimeSpent FROM ACM_RegimeOccupancy WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_RegimeOccupancy WHERE EquipID = $equipment) ORDER BY RegimeLabel

SELECT Timestamp AS time, ForecastHealth AS [Forecast Health], CiLower AS [CI Lower], CiUpper AS [CI Upper] FROM ACM_HealthForecast_TS WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) ORDER BY Timestamp
SELECT Timestamp AS time, FailureProb * 100.0 AS [Failure Probability] FROM ACM_FailureForecast_TS WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) ORDER BY Timestamp

SELECT Timestamp AS time, 'Health Forecast' AS metric, ForecastHealth AS value FROM ACM_HealthForecast_TS WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) UNION ALL SELECT Timestamp AS time, 'Confidence Lower' AS metric, CiLower AS value FROM ACM_HealthForecast_TS WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) UNION ALL SELECT Timestamp AS time, 'Confidence Upper' AS metric, CiUpper AS value FROM ACM_HealthForecast_TS WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) ORDER BY time, metric
SELECT Timestamp AS time, DetectorName AS metric, ForecastValue AS value FROM ACM_DetectorForecast_TS WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) ORDER BY Timestamp, DetectorName

-- Fallback to Sensor Hotspots when RUL_Attribution is empty
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ACM_RUL_Attribution WHERE EquipID = $equipment)
BEGIN
  SELECT TOP 10 ra.SensorName, ra.FailureContribution * 100.0 AS FailureContribution, ra.ZScoreAtFailure, ra.AlertCount, ra.FailureTime
  FROM ACM_RUL_Attribution ra
  WHERE ra.EquipID = $equipment
  ORDER BY FailureContribution DESC
END
ELSE
BEGIN
  SELECT TOP 10 SensorName, ROUND(LatestAbsZ * 10, 1) AS FailureContribution, ROUND(LatestAbsZ, 2) AS ZScoreAtFailure, AboveAlertCount AS AlertCount, MaxTimestamp AS FailureTime
  FROM ACM_SensorHotspots
  WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_SensorHotspots WHERE EquipID = $equipment)
  ORDER BY LatestAbsZ DESC
END

panels.title: Failure Attribution by Sensor (Predicted Root Causes)

targets.rawSql: SELECT TOP 15 DetectorType AS detector, ContributionPct AS contribution, ZScore AS zscore FROM ACM_ContributionCurrent WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_ContributionCurrent WHERE EquipID = $equipment) ORDER BY ContributionPct DESC

SELECT Timestamp AS time, DetectorType AS detector, ContributionPct AS contribution FROM ACM_ContributionTimeline WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) ORDER BY Timestamp, DetectorType

SELECT DetectorType as [Detector], ROUND(MeanZ, 2) as [Mean Z], ROUND(P95Z, 2) as [P95 Z], ROUND(P99Z, 2) as [P99 Z], ROUND(ClipZ, 1) as [Clip Threshold], ROUND(SaturationPct, 1) as [Saturation %] FROM ACM_CalibrationSummary WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_CalibrationSummary WHERE EquipID = $equipment)

SELECT ComponentName as [Component], ROUND(MAX(CASE WHEN MetricType = 'VarianceRatio' THEN Value END), 4) as [Variance %], ROUND(MAX(CASE WHEN MetricType = 'CumulativeVariance' THEN Value END), 4) as [Cumulative %] FROM ACM_PCA_Metrics WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND ComponentName <> 'Total' GROUP BY ComponentName ORDER BY ComponentName

SELECT DetectorA as detector1, DetectorB as detector2, AVG(PearsonR) as correlation FROM ACM_DetectorCorrelation WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_DetectorCorrelation WHERE EquipID = $equipment) GROUP BY DetectorA, DetectorB ORDER BY DetectorA, DetectorB

SELECT TotalEpisodes as [Total Episodes], ROUND(AvgDurationHours, 1) as [Avg Duration (h)], ROUND(MaxDurationHours, 1) as [Max Duration (h)], ROUND(RatePerDay, 2) as [Episodes/Day], ROUND(MeanInterarrivalHours, 1) as [Interarrival (h)] FROM ACM_EpisodeMetrics WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND RunID = (SELECT MAX(RunID) FROM ACM_EpisodeMetrics WHERE EquipID = $equipment)

SELECT ht.Timestamp AS time, 'FusedZ' AS metric, ht.FusedZ AS value FROM ACM_HealthTimeline ht WHERE ht.EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(ht.Timestamp) UNION ALL SELECT ht.Timestamp AS time, 'Adaptive Threshold' AS metric, (SELECT TOP 1 ThresholdValue FROM ACM_ThresholdMetadata WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND ThresholdType = 'fused_alert_z' AND RegimeID IS NULL AND IsActive = 1 ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC) AS value FROM ACM_HealthTimeline ht WHERE ht.EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(ht.Timestamp) UNION ALL SELECT ht.Timestamp AS time, 'Hardcoded 3.0' AS metric, 3.0 AS value FROM ACM_HealthTimeline ht WHERE ht.EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(ht.Timestamp) ORDER BY time, metric
SELECT Timestamp AS time, 'OMR_Z' AS metric, OMR_Z AS value FROM ACM_OMRTimeline WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) ORDER BY Timestamp

SELECT TOP 20 SensorName, AVG(ContributionPct) AS AvgContribution, MAX(ContributionPct) AS MaxContribution, COUNT(*) AS Occurrences FROM ACM_OMRContributionsLong WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) GROUP BY SensorName ORDER BY AvgContribution DESC

SELECT o.Timestamp AS time, 'OMR_Z' AS metric, o.OMR_Z AS value FROM ACM_OMRTimeline o WHERE o.EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(o.Timestamp) UNION ALL SELECT s.Timestamp AS time, 'AR1_Z' AS metric, s.ar1_z AS value FROM ACM_Scores_Wide s WHERE s.EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(s.Timestamp) AND s.ar1_z IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT s.Timestamp AS time, 'PCA_SPE_Z' AS metric, s.pca_spe_z AS value FROM ACM_Scores_Wide s WHERE s.EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(s.Timestamp) AND s.pca_spe_z IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT s.Timestamp AS time, 'IForest_Z' AS metric, s.iforest_z AS value FROM ACM_Scores_Wide s WHERE s.EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(s.Timestamp) AND s.iforest_z IS NOT NULL ORDER BY time, metric

SELECT r.RegimeLabel, AVG(o.OMR_Z) AS AvgOMR_Z, MAX(o.OMR_Z) AS MaxOMR_Z, MIN(o.OMR_Z) AS MinOMR_Z, COUNT(*) AS SampleCount FROM ACM_OMRTimeline o INNER JOIN ACM_RegimeTimeline r ON o.EquipID = r.EquipID AND o.Timestamp = r.Timestamp WHERE o.EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(o.Timestamp) GROUP BY r.RegimeLabel ORDER BY r.RegimeLabel

SELECT TOP 50 episode_id AS EpisodeID, peak_timestamp AS PeakTime, duration_h AS DurationHours, peak_z AS MaxFusedZ, avg_z AS AvgFusedZ, severity AS Severity, dominant_sensor AS TopCulprit FROM ACM_EpisodeDiagnostics WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY peak_timestamp DESC

SELECT TOP 30 StartTimestamp, EndTimestamp, PrimaryDetector AS Culprit, WeightedContribution AS Contribution, DuringMeanZ AS AvgZScore FROM ACM_CulpritHistory WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY StartTimestamp DESC, WeightedContribution DESC

SELECT CASE WHEN duration_h < 0.167 THEN '< 10 min' WHEN duration_h < 0.5 THEN '10-30 min' WHEN duration_h < 1.0 THEN '30-60 min' WHEN duration_h < 2.0 THEN '1-2 hours' ELSE '> 2 hours' END AS DurationBucket, COUNT(*) AS EpisodeCount FROM ACM_EpisodeDiagnostics WHERE EquipID = $equipment GROUP BY CASE WHEN duration_h < 0.167 THEN '< 10 min' WHEN duration_h < 0.5 THEN '10-30 min' WHEN duration_h < 1.0 THEN '30-60 min' WHEN duration_h < 2.0 THEN '1-2 hours' ELSE '> 2 hours' END

SELECT TOP 30 Timestamp AS DetectedAt, DetectorType AS Detector, ZScore AS Magnitude, Direction FROM ACM_ThresholdCrossings WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND Direction IS NOT NULL ORDER BY Timestamp DESC
SELECT Timestamp AS time, DetectorType AS metric, ZScore AS value FROM ACM_ThresholdCrossings WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) ORDER BY Timestamp
SELECT Timestamp AS time, 'Failure Probability' AS metric, FailureProb AS value FROM ACM_FailureForecast_TS WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND $__timeFilter(Timestamp) ORDER BY Timestamp

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT EquipID FROM ACM_HealthTimeline ORDER BY EquipID
list.label: Equipment
list.name: equipment
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT EquipID FROM ACM_HealthTimeline ORDER BY EquipID
